name: Balling Over It
description:
A reimagination of basketball in the style of Getting Over It with Bennet Foddy. Created with Unity for 53-471 at Carnegie Mellon University.

Credits

  • Carol He - Production, Art
  • Jonathan Fischer - Music, Sound
  • Nina Gao - UI/UX, Art
  • Scott King - Programming, Writing, Level Design
  • Yu Xi Lee - Art
  • Zheng Wang - Programming
